desc.en: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_cn: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she, Aris, was being kidnapped or not, but was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.jp: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she, Aris, was being kidnapped or not, but was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃井和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃井和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Yuuka started questioning and Momoi fixed her eyes onto Aris nervously, yet Aris still made huge mistakes.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香开始提问，桃井则紧张地看着爱丽丝，然而即使这样爱丽丝仍然出了差错。

desc.en: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Department. Yet Yuuka also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.jp: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Department. Yet Yuuka also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.zh_cn: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。

desc.en: After Yuuka left, Yuzu got out of her wardrobe, stating that she would like to go to the Ruins to find the book G.Bible. She agreed the idea of protecting the club together purposed by Momoi and Midori.
desc.jp: After Yuuka left, Yuzu got out of her wardrobe, stating that she would like to go to the Ruins to find the book G.Bible. She agreed the idea of protecting the club together purposed by Momoi and Midori.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香走后，柚子从柜子里出来，表示要前往废墟找到《G.Bible》一书。她同意桃井和绿两人的想法，想要一起保护社团。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香走后，柚子从柜子里出来，表示要前往废墟找到《G.Bible》一书。她同意桃井和绿两人的想法，想要一起保护社团。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香走后，柚子从柜子里出来，表示要前往废墟找到《G.Bible》一书。她同意桃和绿两人的想法，想要一起保护社团。
